scripts.confirmation:
echo 'Are you sure? (y/n)' && read -r answer && [ "$answer" = "y" ] && echo '
'
scripts.enrich: npm run confirmation -s && npm run build -s && DROP_DATABASE=true npm run enrich:egrul -s && npm run enrich:egrip -s
scripts.enrich:egrul: npm run confirmation -s && npm run build -s && REGISTRY_TYPE=egrul node dist/enrich
scripts.enrich:egrip: npm run confirmation -s && npm run build -s && REGISTRY_TYPE=egrip node dist/enrich
scripts.enrich:test: npm run build -s && DROP_DATABASE=true npm run enrich:egrul:test -s && npm run enrich:egrip:test -s
scripts.enrich:egrul:test: npm run build -s && NODE_ENV=testing REGISTRY_TYPE=egrul node dist/enrich
scripts.enrich:egrip:test: npm run build -s && NODE_ENV=testing REGISTRY_TYPE=egrip node dist/enrich
scripts.sitemap: npm run confirmation -s && npm run build -s && npm run clean:sitemap -s && node dist/sitemap-creator
scripts.sitemap:test: npm run build -s && npm run clean:sitemap:test -s && NODE_ENV=testing node dist/sitemap-creator
